title: Mario Gariazzo | Passport for a Corpse (1962) Crime, Thriller | Colorized Movie

sources.title: Mario Gariazzo | Passport for a Corpse (1962) Crime, Thriller | Colorized Movie
sources.description:
A chilling crime turns into a fight for survival.
Maurizio, a payroll thief, must survive in a coffin headed for a refrigerated morgue vault. After freeing himself, he becomes stranded in a raging blizzard and is haunted throughout the film by a woman who may or may not be real. This unique and strange 60s film becomes increasingly weird as it progresses

Original title: Lasciapassare per il morto (1962) AKA: Passport for a Corpse
This film has English audio, and is subtitled in many languages.

Black & White version: https://youtu.be/NoYRXgP07f4

Director: Mario Gariazzo
Writers: Gennard Arendo, Carlo Ferrero, Mario Gariazzo
Stars: Alberto Lupo, Hélène Chanel, Linda Christian
Genres: Colorized, Italian cinema, Giallo, Drama, Thriller


00:00 Full Movie (with subtitles)
05:16 A heist plan gone wrong leads to betrayal and tragedy among the criminals involved.
13:59 A man struggles with the consequences of a failed robbery and faces a life-changing decision.
22:40 A thrilling escape plan unfolds as two individuals attempt to cross the border into France.
36:27 A man trapped in a coffin experiences a series of hallucinations and struggles to escape.
1:18:04 Desperate man seeks redemption and connection before tragic end in a foreign land.
